member.name: T:CSCodec.Filters.Transformation.TimeDomainAliasingCancellation

member.param: The output buffer. Must be 1/2 times as long as input.
member.exception: output must be 1/2 times as long as input.

member.name: M:System.Int24.CompareTo(System.Int24)
member.summary: Compares the value of this instance to a specified value and returns an integer that indicates whether this instance is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified value.
